onboarding_welcome.title: Welcome aboard!
onboarding_welcome.subtitle: We are very excited to have you with us, let’s get started.

onboarding_explanation.description_1: With Crunch you can order pickup cooler than ever. And faster.
onboarding_explanation.description_2: Discover new places, collect stamps and benefit from special discounts from your favourite stores.
onboarding_explanation.description_3: See where others are eating, send gifts to your friends and enjoy food together.

onboarding.agreeToTerms: By continuing, I agree to Crunch’s Terms of service and Privacy Policy.
onboarding.signUpCTA: Let’s get started by choosing one of the ways to sign up below.
onboarding.signInCTA: Please enter your phone number to log in again!
